value:
$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Is this a new kind of Idolasphere?
Something feels strange about it...
Careful, everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|...But if we focus on song, it'll be so
easy! With Kiria's supreme voice, we
could sweep the WORLD off its feet!$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|No, no. We should focus on a strong
narrative! With my acting, even the
Hollywood types will be jealous.$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|...What's going on? Did you two hear
what I said over your— Is this an
argument? You two never argue...$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|We have to make a new intro video
to bring new talent in for Fortuna.
That's what they're arguing about.$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Oh, right. I remember hearing about
that now. Just a short video, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_まもり,ch12_03_Mamori_F_Normal,Face|Yep! But Ms. Maiko said that if WE
make all the production decisions,
it might turn out even better...$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Hm. Seems Ms. Maiko is asking
a little too much, as usual...$k$pSo, the two of you disagree because
Tsubasa wants to focus on music and
Ellie wants to focus on story?$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|Professional performers often have
strong opinions... Some disagreement
may be unavoidable.$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|...Oh, I know! What if we split up
and take on the Mirages of this
strange Idolasphere.$k$pEveryone keep track of how many
you defeat, and whoever gets the
most gets to be the director!$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|A competition? All right, but there's
no way Caeda and I are going to lose!$k$pHere I go! See ya!$k$p$WmMPID_エレオノーラ,ch12_02_Eleonora_F_Normal,Face|Hey, no fair! You jumped the gun!
TSUBASAAAAA!$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|And they're off without a second
thought... I should follow Tsubasa.
Kiria, can I leave Ellie to you?$k$p$WmMPID_霧亜,ch12_04_Kiria_F_Normal,Face|No problem.$k$p

$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|I said it before but, there's something
strange about this Idolasphere... Hey,
Tsubasa—wait up!$k$p$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|I'm going to be the director...and
then I'll have Kiria put on an amazing
performance for me...$k$pAs the director, I'll have her sing
whatever I want... All my favorites!$k$pHee hee... Ah ha ha haaa!$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Hm... Seems like she's already on
a mission. Might be too late to change
her mind.$k$pI'll have to just focus on protecting
her for the time being...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_つばさ,ch12_01_Tsubasa_F_Normal,Face|Huh? ...Itsuki? Wh-where...is Kiria?
She was just here, modeling a new
fashion swimsuit for me...$k$p$WmMPID_樹,ch12_00_Itsuki_M_Normal,Face|Seems like you're back to your usual
self, Tsubasa. Now, let's get out of
here while we're clear.$k$p$Sbs150|
